venue.name: Goodwin Funeral Home - near parking lot

item.description:
North End Walking Tour
Sunday, September 19, 2010
1:30 p.m.-3:30 p.m.
$5 MHA members - $10 general public
Pre-registration is required by calling (603)622-7531 or via Meetup

Join local historians John P. Jordan and Dick Duckoff for a fascinating North End visit. Travel the trail of the visionaries and the successful citizens of Manchester's Victorian era. See the elegant Straw mansion, the site of the fairgrounds and trotting park, and of the Webster General Hospital where many Union soldiers received care during the Civil War. The tour will begin at the parking lot of Goodwin Funeral home at 607 Chestnut Street (corner of Chestnut and Harrison Streets).
item.name: North End Walking Tour
